summary:
Weapon Set: Completed,
Shield: Completed, 
Armour: Completed
descriptionHtml:
UPDATE: August 2013:

Hey guys, I\'m back from Hiatus and have decided that my 1st Project back will me a mod for Fallout 3 named: \"Elgar\'s Extra Random Encounters.esp\"....I am currently in the planning stage. Progress will be under-way within 7 days.

*******

These are not just re-textures, they are their own tier of armor & weapons with slightly enhanced stats. (Slightly Lighter, Slightly Faster and 10 - 20% more powerful than the Vanilla Draugr tier) + Arrows Packing a more formidable punch (Still Fair & balanced As Always)

PLEASE NOTE: That the damage in the pictures is due to a mod I am using.
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
NOTE: This is Cream Silver based on Venetian cream silver. 

(http://www.venicemaskedball.co.uk/ekmps/shops/maskedball/images/venetian-style-cream-silver-baroque-half-mask-2826-p.jpg)

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
All textures are now always from HD sources. Including this one
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Hey guys,

They can all be found in the Draugr Section of Blacksmithing.

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Armour: Male & Female (All Races: YES)
[x] Silver Crypt Armour
    [x]  Boots
    [x]  Gauntlets
    [x]  Helmet  
    [x]  Chest plate

Shield:
[x] Shield

Weapons:
[X] Silver Crypt Weapon Set
    [x]  Silver Crypt Sword
    [x]  Silver Crypt Greatsword
    [x]  Silver Crypt Handaxe 
    [x]  Silver Crypt Battleaxe
    [x]  Silver Crypt Arrows
    [x]  Silver Crypt Bow

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Update 9: (30/12/2012) @ 8:30pm

*** Female Chest plate armour

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Update 8: (30/12/2012) @ 5:45pm

*** Full Male Armour Done 

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Update 7: (29/12/2012) @ 10:30am 

*** Added Silver Crypt Worn Shield

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Update 6: (28/12/2012) @ 12pm (GMT +0)

*** Added Silver Crypt Bow

NOTE: Any bows which are custom to Skyrim, once dropped, will not appear. You will need to make another if dropped. Tested this with several custom bows (Bronze bow & Silver Crypt bow + Nicroshi\'s Doomshard bow etc) Tested with 1 extra mod and all mods turned on 

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Update 5: (27/12/2012) @ 12pm (GMT +0)

*** Added Silver Crypt Battle Axe

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Update 4: (28/12/2012) @ 5:20pm (GMT +0)

*** Added Silver Crypt Handaxe (Waraxe)

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Update 3: (27/12/2012) @ 12pm (GMT +0)

*** Added Silver Crypt Sword

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Update 2: (27/12/2012) @ 9am (GMT +0) (Mini Update)

*** Added the SilverSwordScript (Silver Perk on Equip)

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Update 1: (27/12/2012)

*** Added Silver Crypt Arrows
